    • Class base.BaseModel extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

          int id
          ID of the Menu or Promo object.

  • Package invoice

    • Class invoice.Invoice extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • gst
          float gst
          GST of the invoice.
        • invoiceId
          int invoiceId
          ID of the invoice.
        • menuItems
          java.util.ArrayList<Menu> menuItems
          ArrayList of menu items of the invoice.
        • order
          Order order
          Order of the invoice.
        • promoItems
          java.util.ArrayList<Promo> promoItems
          ArrayList of promotion items of the invoice.
        • serviceCharge
          float serviceCharge
          Service charge of the invoice.
        • subtotal
          float subtotal
          Sub-total of the invoice.
        • timestamp
          java.time.LocalDateTime timestamp
          Time-stamp of the invoice.
        • total
          float total
          Total bill of the invoice.

    • Class menu.Menu extends BaseModel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • description
          java.lang.String description
          Description of the menu item.

          Name of the menu item.
        • price

          Price of the menu item.
        • type
          MenuType type
          Type of the menu item (MainCourse, Dessert, Drink).
